footer_conceptual: This service is for demo/learning purposes. Do not use real funds, private keys, or sensitive data.
failed_to_load_puzzles: Failed to load puzzles. Please try again later.
reward_modal_description: You've solved the puzzle. Here is the recovery phrase:
reward_modal_guidance: Once you solve the puzzle and the recovery phrase for your wallet is revealed, please withdraw your funds as soon as possible before someone else does. The recovery phrase will disappear if you refresh the page.
security_warning_description: Store this phrase securely. Anyone with this phrase can access the wallet's funds. Do not share it.
reenter_guidance: Re-enter the correct answer to view the reward again.
one_time_reveal_warning: This reward is revealed only once. Please store it securely.
already_solved_message: This puzzle has already been correctly solved by someone else.
empty_state_description: Try changing the filter or check back later.
more_puzzles_description: New puzzles will be provided once all current puzzles are solved.
landing_subtitle: Cryptography-inspired image puzzles with one-time rewards and a global leaderboard.
landing_feat_rewards_desc: One-time reveal rewards per puzzle. Claim quickly and securely.
landing_feat_security_desc: Clear guidance and warnings to protect your secret phrases.
landing_feat_pace_desc: Optimized UX with filters, skeletons, and accessible modals.
about_intro: Passcode is a cryptography-inspired puzzle playground. Solve image-based challenges to reveal one-time rewards. Learn and have fun while staying safe with clear security guidance.
about_how_it_works_1: Browse the puzzle list with filters.
about_how_it_works_2: Submit your answer; if correct, a reward is revealed once.
about_how_it_works_3: Securely store any secret phrases; never share them.
about_safety_1: Do not use real funds or sensitive keys.
about_safety_2: Withdraw promptly if a reward reveals a wallet phrase.
about_safety_3: Admins may remove inappropriate solver names.
